articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
RT Scalara
Let's look at how Flexible Leverage Indices work:
#FLIs are collateralized debt positions providing positive exposure to the deposited and negative exposure to the borrowed asset.
E.g. 1 iBTC-FLI currently represents about $180 $USDC deposited and $85 $WBTC borrowed against. /1
